attributes.action: Scrap universal credits! Stop crippling britains most vulnerable.
attributes.additional_details: Your government claims that adults and children need a certain amount to live on but you then take that money back with your caps. Some of the most vulnerable family's whom rely on the state to survive are being refused the help you claim to offer. Plus the universal credits staff don't follow government legislation and nothing can be done about it complaints are completely disregarded people are left with no food gas and electric and no rent money so therefore becoming homes less. Scrap UC NOW
attributes.background: We have all heard about the bad publicity universal credits is gaining for itself Theresa may you claim its working it's not working it's leaving children and family's and sick people with no income Some people simply are not in a position to work.with the benefit cap people can't even pay rent
